General.Name: Galaxy Payroll Group Limited Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Galaxy Payroll Group Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides payroll outsourcing, employment, and consultancy and market research services. It has operations in Hong Kong, Macau, the People's Republic of China, Taiwan, Japan, Australia, Thailand, Malaysia, Vietnam, India, Indonesia, Singapore, Bangladesh, and the Philippines. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.
